verses.roman:
e-saba pāṣaṇḍīra tabe ha-ibe nistāra
āra kona upāya nāhi, ei yukti sāra

synonyms: e-saba—all these; pāṣaṇḍīra—of the demons; tabe—then; ha-ibe—there will be; nistāra—deliverance; āra—alternative; kona—some; upāya—means; nāhi—there is not; ei—this; yukti—of the argument; sāra—essence.
translation: "All the unfaithful rogues of this world can be delivered by this process. There is no alternative. This is the essence of the argument."
